#include<string>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
int main(){

int m,n,i,j,times,rem;
scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
vector<int> coeff,fx;
coeff.resize(n+1);
fx.resize(1009);
int ans=0,totsum=0;
for(i=n;i>=0;i--){scanf("%d",&coeff[i]);}
times=m/1009;
rem=m %1009;
for(j=0;j<1009;j++){
ans=0;
for(i=n;i>=0;i--){
ans=ans*j+coeff[i];
ans=ans%1009;
}
totsum+=ans;
totsum= totsum %1009;
fx[j]=ans;
//cout<<fx[j]<<"\t"<<ans<<endl;
}
int final,remtot=0;
for(j=0;j<=rem;j++){remtot+=fx[j];remtot=remtot % 1009;}
final =totsum*times +remtot;
final=final%1009;
printf("%d\n",final);
}
